member.name: T:GoCoSupermarket.DataInterfaces.IStockKeepingUnitRepository
member.summary: DAL class which would, in a real life application, access the database to retrieve stock pricing.

member.name: M:GoCoSupermarket.DataInterfaces.IStockKeepingUnitRepository.GetStockKeepingUnits(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Char})
member.summary: Returns a set of StockKeepingUnits for each item purchased.
member.param: The codes of the items purchased.
